com.mousebird.maply

Class PlateCarreeCoordSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.CoordSystem
      • com.mousebird.maply.PlateCarreeCoordSystem

  • public class PlateCarreeCoordSystem
extends CoordSystem
    The Plate Carree coordinate system is just a fancy name for stretching lat/lon out onto a plane in the dumbest way possible.

    This coordinate system is often used by display adapters or the contents of paging layers.
